name: Mumbai University
primary_focus: Providing high-quality, inclusive education that integrates theoretical knowledge with practical application. It is dedicated to preparing students for a globalized world through academic excellence, innovation, and industry collaboration.
description: University of Mumbai (Mumbai, Maharashtra) is one of India’s oldest state public universities with comprehensive teaching and research across arts, science, commerce, management, law and technology; it operates numerous affiliated colleges and centres.
accreditation: Granted University with Potential for Excellence (UPE) status by UGC.
Ranked 54th in the University category and 92nd in the Overall category in India.
awards: Regularly listed in national rankings (NIRF/ARIIA categories)
